projects.title: Aleatory
projects.description: Create custom lottery draws with your own entries
projects.fullDescription:
Aleatory is a lottery app for creating custom draws with your own entries. Save frequently used items in folders, track complete draw history with timestamps, and enjoy smooth animated wheel transitions.

Build your library of contestants or options and reuse them instantly. Create tournament brackets with group stages or single-elimination formats, customize rules, and track progression.

Use as guest for quick draws, or create an account to sync your data across devices.
